MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Boundary Road, Devon Street, Silkstone Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 8:25PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15PM on Saturday 23rd January 2021
